name: Short Fuse (itch) (agitprop)
description:
Welcome to SHORT FUSE, a simple 3D “bottom-up” shooter. Launch firework shells arcing high into the sky. Make them collide and explode in dazzling fireworks!

Extend your time and boost your points with special powerup fireworks. And watch out! Shells you miss can kill you when they fall back to earth! Can you beat your high score?
